p:
DENV2 is classified into six genotypes, named I-VI.
3 To date, three genetic lineages of DENV2 genotype III (DENV2-III) have been reported in Brazil on the basis of phylogenetic analysis of the relationships of partial and complete genomes of circulating strains. These three circulating lineages have been named as lineages 1-3
5 or BR1-BR3.
26 Our maximum likelihood (ML) phylogenetic analysis shows a separate introduction of DENV2, hereafter named DENV2-III BR-4 [ Supplementary data (Fig. 2)].
